title: Cleanup Excel or CSV data - adjust, delete rows and columns
resultDatasetName: Name of the new dataset to be created
listofRowNumbersRemove: (Optional) List of row numbers (comma separated e.g. 1,4,5,20:30) to be removed
listofColumnNumbersRemove: (Optional) List of column numbers (comma separated e.g. 1,2,6:10) to be removed
rowNumbersContaingColNames: Enter row numbers (comma separated e.g. 3,4) to be used for column names for the output dataset
deleteRowNumbersContaingColNamesChk: Delete the rows containing column names for the output dataset
combineWithExsitingColNamesChk: Column names created, combine them with existing column header names
specifyColumnNamesRad: Specify column names manually for the output dataset
outputColumnNames: Enter column names (comma separated) to be used for the output dataset
removeColsWithConstantChk: Remove all columns with constant values (case insensitive)
removeRowsWithNAsChk: Keep only complete cases i.e. remove the entire row if any empty or NA value
label1: Converting column types in the output dataset
convertColumnDataTypeAuto: Determine column data type automatically and convert
convertColumnDataTypeFactorToCharInt: Convert all factor columns to character and integer type
convertColumnDataTypeCharToFactor: Convert all character columns to factors
convertColumnDataTypeManual: Type in the data type for each column to convert
outputColumnTypes: List of column types (comma separated e.g. numeric, factor, character, ..)

help.title: Cleanup Excel or CSV data - adjust, delete rows and columns
help.body:
Description
This dialog is used to clean up a complex Excel sheet to add and remove rows and columns to create a new dataset

To try this, you may use the sample dataset file called Excel cleanup.xlsx
Open the file in the data grid with the file open menu
In the dialog - type
SampleGp for the new dataset name
1:3 for list of row numbers to be removed
1,2,5:8 for list of column numbers to be removed
Select the option - Specify column names from the datasets
2,3 for Enter row numbers
